## Duration histgram

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(conflicted)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

df <- read_excel('behavioural_sample_label.xlsx') %>% 
  as_tibble()
df

df <- df %>% 
  dplyr::select(BH, JHTSCourseNew) %>% 
  mutate(JHTSCourseNew = as.numeric(JHTSCourseNew)) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(JHTSCourseNew > 20)

pdf('HTNDuration_hist_morethan20.pdf')
hist(
  df$JHTSCourseNew, 
  main = 'Histogram of HTN Duration', 
  ylab = 'Number of participant', 
  xlab = 'HTN duration(Year)')
dev.off()
```
